Title: Gruber Does Some Mincing
Actors: Gorden Kaye, Francesca Gonshaw, Carmen Silvera
Plot: Lieutenant Gruber is about to mince the sausage his dog brought in when he discovers the painting The Fallen Madonna with the Big Boobies by Van Klomp. The Resistance pay off Monsieur Alfonse, who provided the ransom money, with n...
